attributes.header-text: An official website of the United States government

components.content: Brief instructions for completing this form.
We need basic information to locate your military records. Please provide as much information as possible for the best results.

attributes.alert-text: We use your Social Security Number to verify your identity. Your information is protected and encrypted.

components.content: Did this person retire from military service?
Please provide information about all periods of military service. This helps us locate the correct records.

attributes.hint: List the most recent duty stations
attributes.name: lastDutyStation
attributes.label: Last duty station(s)

components.content: Has this person filed a claim with the VA?
Select the specific records or information you're requesting. Check all that apply.

attributes.name: dd214
attributes.label: DD Form 214 or equivalent (Report of Separation)

components.content: This helps us provide the best possible response.

attributes.hint: Provide any additional information that might help us locate your records
attributes.name: additionalDetails
attributes.label: Additional details (optional)

attributes.name: relationship
attributes.label: I am the deceased veteran's next-of-kin

attributes.name: relationship
attributes.label: I am the veteran's legal guardian

components.content: Please review your information before submitting your military records request.

attributes.section1-content: Name: [Your entered name] Social Security Number: [Your entered SSN] Date of birth: [Your entered date] Place of birth: [Your entered place]
attributes.section2-content: Branch: [Selected branch] Service dates: [Entered dates] Service number: [Entered number] Last duty station: [Entered station]
attributes.section3-content: Records requested: [Selected records] Purpose: [Selected purpose] Relationship: [Selected relationship] Mailing address: [Entered address]

attributes.name: certification
attributes.label: I certify that the information provided is true and correct to the best of my knowledge, and I authorize the release of the requested information.

attributes.text: After you submit this request, we'll process it and send your military records to the address you provided. Processing time varies depending on the type of records requested.
attributes.heading: What happens next?
